page_content: The page discusses the government's stance on proposed changes in spousal taxation and asylum regulations.
The page discusses the challenges in healthcare staffing and measures to improve the situation.
The page discusses the reorganization of civil registry offices and the introduction of an IT-supported central system named Infostar.
The page provides various publications and reports related to spatial development, mobility, and planning in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses the future development of civil protection in Graubünden, focusing on organizational reforms and responsibilities.
The page provides information on SofTax JP, a software for tax declaration for legal entities, along with guides and forms for profit and capital tax.
The page discusses a four-month internship program for young farmers from Romania in Graubünden, focusing on agricultural training and financial support.
